ip_byoip_description: Import your own public IP addresses, and use them on eligible OVHcloud services.
ip_byoip_select_rir_title: Select your RIR - Regional Internet Registry
ip_byoip_select_rir_description: Select the RIR that manages your public IP addresses.
ip_byoip_region_description: A region is the set of datacentres you can move your IP addresses to. The list of datacentres that make up a region is displayed below. You must select the region where your services will be located.
ip_byoip_region_token_description: To confirm that you are the owner of the IP address range you want to import, you must update the WHOIS entry for your IP range using the token below. The token must appear in a specific field of the WHOIS object (see below), on a dedicated line. The token must be added before placing the order, and must remain in place until the service is delivered.
ip_byoip_region_token_description_1: For RIPE, edit the ‘descr’ field of the ‘inetnum’ object of the IP address.
ip_byoip_region_token_description_2: For ARIN, edit the ‘Public Comments’ field of the ‘Network’ object.
ip_byoip_select_ip_range_description: Specify the IP address range you want to import (the range size must be between /19 and /24). If the range size is greater than /24, the address range will be segmented into a contiguous set of /24 size ranges
ip_byoip_as_system_description: Choose the AS with which to advertise your IP address block over the internet
ip_byoip_as_rir_title: Select the RIR that manages your AS number
ip_byoip_order_finish_error: An error has occurred configuring BYOIP.
ip_byoip_token_fetch_error: An error occurred retrieving the IP token for the region selected.
ip_byoip_campus_fetch_error: An error has occurred retrieving the regions.
ip_byoip_restriction_warning_message: The Bring Your Own IP service is currently available with restricted access. For further information, please contact your OVHcloud sales representative.
